description: It's good for google drive but there is a very annoying bug. When I opened Microsoft Exchange Account, I typed in the information but there is no way to submit it. There is no submit button and pressing the enter key doesn't do anything no matter what text-box I am in.
summary: It's good for google drive but there is a big bug

description:
On Unity desktop the Connect button is not visible, making it impossible to add an account.
Switching to "Ubuntu on wayland" solved the problem with adding account. After that you can switch back to Unity
